subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The world champion Philippe Gilbert won the 12th stage of the Spanish Vuelta, and Vincenzo Nibali retained the leader’s jersey by 31 seconds over Nicolas Roche.
snippet: The world champion Philippe Gilbert won the 12th stage of the Spanish Vuelta, and Vincenzo Nibali retained the leader’s jersey by 31 seconds over Nicolas Roche.
